nodes.text: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 25

Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 25 is the twenty-fifth and final issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith. It was written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli, and published on December 19, 2018 by Marvel Comics.
FORTRESS VADER: FINALE! The FORTRESS is complete. The door will be opened. VADER finds everything he has ever desired. THE DARK LORD gets everything he deserves.
One of the scenes in Darth Vader 25 takes inspiration from the teaser poster of the film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.
